headline: Introducing ecobee Smart Thermostat Essential: Designed for Savings, Control & Comfort
summary: LAS VEGAS, January 06, 2025--At CES 2025, ecobee announced Smart Thermostat Essential, a new smart thermostat that offers incredible value and maintains the brand's signature comfort and convenience features, including a full color touchscreen, at a lower cost. It is simple to install, easy-to-use and delivers serious savings. Customers can save up to 23%* on annual heating and cooling costs, covering the cost of the device in just six months.

headline: Crane Company Announces Divestiture of Engineered Materials Segment
summary: CR sells its Engineered Materials segment for $227 million to focus on the core businesses while supporting capital allocation priorities.

headline: A. O. Smith Exhibits Strong Prospects Despite Persisting Headwinds
summary: AOS benefits from accretive acquisitions. However, increasing costs remain a concern.
